operation.name: InsertOrUpdate
operation.sql: INSERT INTO hash_tags (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, hash_tag, hash_tag_message_id) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :hash_tag, :hash_tag_message_id) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE deleted=0

operation.name: SelectPeerHashTagList
operation.sql: SELECT hash_tag_message_id FROM hash_tags WHERE user_id = :user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id AND hash_tag = :hash_tag AND deleted = 0

operation.name: DeleteHashTagMessageId
operation.sql: UPDATE hash_tags SET deleted = 1 WHERE user_id = :user_id AND hash_tag_message_id = :hash_tag_message_id
